CustomField.description: E2B (R2): NA E2B (R3): F.r.2.2b Test Name (MedDRA code) User Guidance: This data element captures the MedDRA LLT code for the test name. Conformance: Optional, but required when F.r.1 is populated and F.r.2.1 is not populated. Data Type: 8N OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.163 Value Allowed: Numeric
CustomField.inlineHelpText: User Guidance: This data element captures the MedDRA LLT code for the test name.
CustomField.label: MeDRA Code
